Class ComboBox

ComboBoxes are similar to dropdowns, except a combobox provides an input field for users to search items and (optionally) add their own. Multi-select comboboxes also provide "pills" of selected items.

See demo

../../iframe.html?id=combobox--basic

Hierarchy

  • ComboBox

items

@Input()
items: Array<ListItem> = []
  • Defined in src/combobox/combobox.component.ts:269

List of items to fill the content with.

Example:

items = [
        {
            content: "Abacus",
            selected: false
        },
        {
            content: "Byte",
            selected: false,
        },
        {
            content: "Computer",
            selected: false
        },
        {
            content: "Digital",
            selected: false
        }
];

selectionFeedback

@Input()
selectionFeedback: "top" | "fixed" | "top-after-reopen" = "top-after-reopen"
  • Defined in src/combobox/combobox.component.ts:326

Specify feedback (mode) of the selection. top: selected item jumps to top fixed: selected item stays at its position top-after-reopen: selected item jump to top after reopen dropdown

@Input()
size: "sm" | "md" | "xl" = "md"
  • Defined in src/combobox/combobox.component.ts:279

Combo box render size.

deprecated

since v4

submit

@Output()
submit: EventEmitter<object> = new EventEmitter <{items: ListItem[],index: number,value: {content: string,selected: boolean}}>()
  • Defined in src/combobox/combobox.component.ts:373

Intended to be used to add items to the list.

Emits an event that includes the current item list, the suggested index for the new item, and a simple ListItem

Example:

    {
        items: [{content: "one", selected: true}, {content: "two", selected: true}],
        index: 1,
        value: {
            content: "some user string",
            selected: false
        }
    }

Example:

{
    after: 1,
    value: "some user string"
}

theme

@Input()
theme: "light" | "dark" = "dark"
  • Defined in src/combobox/combobox.component.ts:319

light or dark dropdown theme

@Input()
type: "single" | "multi" = "single"
  • Defined in src/combobox/combobox.component.ts:273
